com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.levenshtein.factory

Interface IIntersectionFactory<DictionaryNode>

  • Type Parameters:
    DictionaryNode - Kind of the nodes in the dictionary automaton.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntersectionFactory

    public interface IIntersectionFactory<DictionaryNode>
    Builds nodes that help intersect a dictionary automaton with a Levenshtein automaton.
    Since:
    2.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Intersection<DictionaryNode> build(String candidate, DictionaryNode dictionaryNode, IState levenshteinState)
      Constructs a new Intersection between two states: one from the dictionary and one from the Levenshtein automaton.
      void recycle(Intersection<DictionaryNode> intersection)
      [Optional Operation] Instructs this factory that the intersection will no longer be used and may be recycled for reuse.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        Intersection<DictionaryNode> build(String candidate,
                                   DictionaryNode dictionaryNode,
                                   IState levenshteinState)
        Constructs a new Intersection between two states: one from the dictionary and one from the Levenshtein automaton.
        Parameters:
        candidate - Substring of the candidate term from the dictionary (spelling candidate of the query term).
        dictionaryNode - Dictionary node representing the final character in the candidate term.
        levenshteinState - Location within the Levenshtein automaton of this intersection.
        Returns:
        New intersection node between dictionaryNode and levenshteinState, having the term-prefix, candidate.

      • recycle

        void recycle(Intersection<DictionaryNode> intersection)
        [Optional Operation] Instructs this factory that the intersection will no longer be used and may be recycled for reuse.
        Parameters:
        intersection - Value to recycle.
